title: In Chef Vikas Khanna's Greeting For Trump, A "Hope" To Cook At White House
content: Many congratulations are coming Donald Trump's way as he secured a historic comeback to the White House as the United States' 47th President. One such greeting came from celebrated Indian chef Vikas Khanna, along with a gentle reminder.
summary: Many congratulations are coming Donald Trump's way as he secured a historic comeback to the White House as the United States' 47th President. One such greeting came from celebrated Indian chef Vikas Khanna, along with a gentle reminder.

title: Trump's 'Day 1' Promise To Shut Clean Energy Projects Send Stocks Tumbling
content: Donald Trump's pledge to stop renewable energy projects on "day one" of his potential presidency has sent shockwaves through the industry, causing renewable energy shares to plummet.
summary: Donald Trump's pledge to stop renewable energy projects on "day one" of his potential presidency has sent shockwaves through the industry, causing renewable energy shares to plummet.

title: Explained: Why Kamala Harris's Historic White House Bid Fell Short
content: In a meeting with one of America's most powerful unions in September at its Washington headquarters, Vice President Kamala Harris said she'd protect union jobs and workers' livelihoods better than Donald Trump.
summary: In a meeting with one of America's most powerful unions in September at its Washington headquarters, Vice President Kamala Harris said she'd protect union jobs and workers' livelihoods better than Donald Trump.

title: Harris To Concede Defeat To Trump Early Tomorrow
content: Vice President and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris will deliver a speech conceding defeat in the US presidential election to Republican candidate Donald Trump, the White House said.
summary: Vice President and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris will deliver a speech conceding defeat in the US presidential election to Republican candidate Donald Trump, the White House said.

title: UK's Prince William Says Wife Kate Doing "Really Well" After Chemotherapy
content: Britain's Prince William said today that his wife Kate was doing "really well" and had been amazing in a year when she has undergone preventative chemotherapy for cancer.
summary: Britain's Prince William said today that his wife Kate was doing "really well" and had been amazing in a year when she has undergone preventative chemotherapy for cancer.

title: This US Woman Ages 34% Slower. Her Longevity Routine Costs Just $12 A Day
content: Ms Clark's progress was validated by the Dunedin PACE blood test, which examines biomarkers associated with ageing.

title: What Trump's Election Win Could Mean For Abortion Laws In US
content: Donald Trump's second presidential term could herald a new wave of attacks on abortion access across the United States -- with or without a Republican-controlled Congress.
summary: Donald Trump's second presidential term could herald a new wave of attacks on abortion access across the United States -- with or without a Republican-controlled Congress.

title: Explained: Impact Of Donald Trump's White House Return On World Economy
content: Donald Trump's return to the White House with his protectionist policies poses threats for the global economy, with the prospect of new trade wars, resurgent inflation and slower growth, experts say.
summary: Donald Trump's return to the White House with his protectionist policies poses threats for the global economy, with the prospect of new trade wars, resurgent inflation and slower growth, experts say.

title: Trump, Still Facing 2020 Capitol Riots Cases, Returns In 2024
content: Millions of Americans on Wednesday celebrated Donald Trump's remarkable return to the White House - the 78-year-old defied pre-poll predictions to become the first Republican in 20 years to win the popular vote en route to the presidency.
summary: Millions of Americans on Wednesday celebrated Donald Trump's remarkable return to the White House - the 78-year-old defied pre-poll predictions to become the first Republican in 20 years to win the popular vote en route to the presidency.

title: Why This Andhra Village Is Celebrating Donald Trump's Election Victory
content: Far from Republican festivities as Donald Trump claimed US election victory, residents of a sleepy Indian village celebrated that their descendant would be the next "Second Lady", hoping to benefit from her success.
summary: Far from Republican festivities as Donald Trump claimed US election victory, residents of a sleepy Indian village celebrated that their descendant would be the next "Second Lady", hoping to benefit from her success.

title: Chinese Woman Adopts Pig Feed Diet to Save Money, Sparking Health Concerns
content: Popular Chinese influencer Kong Yufeng, known as "King Kong Liuke," has sparked health concerns by revealing her diet of pig feed, costing just 3 yuan (Rs 35) per day, to save money.
summary: Popular Chinese influencer Kong Yufeng, known as "King Kong Liuke," has sparked health concerns by revealing her diet of pig feed, costing just 3 yuan (Rs 35) per day, to save money.

title: "If There's One Person On Earth...": Gautam Adani Congratulates Trump
content: Adani Group Chairman Gautam Adani in a post on X congratulated Donald Trump for winning the race to the White House for a second time, calling the new US President an "embodiment of unbreakable tenacity".
summary: Adani Group Chairman Gautam Adani in a post on X congratulated Donald Trump for winning the race to the White House for a second time, calling the new US President an "embodiment of unbreakable tenacity".

title: Harris Isn't 1st Woman US President, But She Has Other Firsts To Her Name
content: More than a decade ago, a journalist called Kamala Harris "female Obama". However, the daughter of Indian and Jamaican immigrants failed to match the achievement of first African-American president Barack Obama.
summary: More than a decade ago, a journalist called Kamala Harris "female Obama". However, the daughter of Indian and Jamaican immigrants failed to match the achievement of first African-American president Barack Obama.

title: This US Airport Will Offer Llama Therapy To Ease Nervous Passengers

title: Once A Donald Trump Critic, JD Vance Is Now His Vice-President-Elect
content: At just 40 years old, JD Vance has become the third-youngest Vice-President in American history and the first millennial to ever appear on a major party's presidential ticket.
summary: At just 40 years old, JD Vance has become the third-youngest Vice-President in American history and the first millennial to ever appear on a major party's presidential ticket.

title: "We're Better Off Together": German Chancellor Tells Donald Trump
content: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Wednesday congratulated US presidential election winner Donald Trump and urged continued close trans-Atlantic ties, telling him in English: "We're better off together".
summary: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Wednesday congratulated US presidential election winner Donald Trump and urged continued close trans-Atlantic ties, telling him in English: "We're better off together".

title: No Woman President For US Yet Again. Kamala Harris Stumbles At Final Hurdle
content: For the second time in eight years, a woman has won the Democratic nomination for US president, only to come up short in a campaign where gender was a central issue.

title: Who Is Usha Vance, 1st Indian-Origin Woman Set To Become Second Lady Of US

title: Donald Trump Defies All Odds, Wins 2024 Election Amid Legal Battles
content: Donald Trump touted his ability to "get away with it" as a defining theme of his life story when he first ran for president in 2016 -- boasting that he could shoot someone on New York's Fifth Avenue without losing a single vote.
summary: Donald Trump touted his ability to "get away with it" as a defining theme of his life story when he first ran for president in 2016 -- boasting that he could shoot someone on New York's Fifth Avenue without losing a single vote.
